section_items.section_item_description:
Transfer the on-site information to a digital virtual environment.

IPT provides a pre-design package to assist local consultancy for future design work.

Land surveying to draft up the existing site plan aims to capture all useful existing site information.

For some particular high-risk projects, laser scanning would be our toolkit to reflect real-site situations to assist clients or designers or constructors in understanding the risk and having a clear picture of the scopes.  

Implementation:

Residential subdivision
Commercial as-built
Civil Bridge and Infrastructure

categories_overview_description:
Some short description about flow:

Predesign > Design > Construction > Operation & Maintenance
